casebody.data:
Tel-Tru Manufacturing Co., Inc., Respondent, v North River Insurance Company, Appellant, et al, Defendants. (Appeal No. 3.)

Order unanimously reversed, without costs, defendant North River Insurance Company’s motion for summary judgment granted, and judgment entered in its favor, in accordance with same memorandum as in Tel-Tru Mfg. Co. v North Riv. Ins. Co. (Appeal No. 1) (90 AD2d 670). (Appeals from order of Supreme Court, Monroe County, Curran, J. — summary judgment.) Present — Dillon, P. J., Simons, Doerr, Moule and Schnepp, JJ.
